Text: Hey can you tell me where to put the files? I know i'm a noob :D Thx anyways

Put them on My Documents > Electronic Arts > Sims 3 > DCCache     ---and Program Files > Electronic Arts > The Sims 3 > Mods > DCCachennIf folder doesn\'t exist, create it, pass files in both folders.
Will this work with all the expansion packs installed?

Is anyone else having an issue with the store items not showing up in the game? I'm running Ambitions, and I have downloaded this torrent, another torrent to test, uninstalled and reinstalled all my games. All the items worked with the base game and WA. Once i got to High End, the items didn't appear in-game. Once I installed Ambitions, the items still haven't appeared. The launcher shows them as 'installed' - any ideas??

yes im having the same problem as xxmeegs20xx ive got a torrented version of sims 3, with no addons (i.e ambitions etc.) but all my items arn't showing up. ive installed them it says installed but they just arnt there.
